Corruption or cash-for-access is more common overseas. Donate to political party  can have dinner or even phone number. US politicians spend a lot of time flying around to attend political fundraising dinners. After retirement can earn 5/6 figures giving a single speech.Here the politicians pay for all their meals. Guest of honour for events then get free meal after giving short speech. Most ministers retire permanently except a few like George Yeo
